Articles.Content:
hi there everyone, just wanted to come here an show some love for a game that is in alpha called Planet Explorers. I play this game when I can pry myself away from KSP and thought some of you might like to check it out. Planet explorers is a really awesome game that lets you explore a new world and find resources to survive. It lets you craft guns, swords, shields, vehicles, and many other things. You can discover underground caves and mine for different kinds or ore including iron, copper, silver, gold, and many more and make useful items and buildings doing so. check it out, its an awesome game.

Try the a0.53 demo: http://planetexplorers.pathea.net/download/

http://planetexplorers.pathea.net/

Edited September 14, 2013 by RoCkEtZoMbIe
Wanted to try, but when i hit the download button it redirected me to some chinese download page. So probably malware.

Wanted to try, but when i hit the download button it redirected me to some chinese download page. So probably malware.

It's just a file sharing website. Any you wanna hit the blue button on the left.

I got in on this during the kickstarter, it's not bad. In game terrain modification and the like.

Pathea is partially based out of China, so it does make some sense for them to use Chinese file sharing sites.
